data.title: regenie
data.description: regenie is a C++ program for whole genome regression modelling of large genome-wide association studies.
data.name: regenie

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "- It works on quantitative, binary, and time-to-event traits, including binary traits with unbalanced case-control ratios and time-to-event traits with low event rates"
"regenie is a C++ program for whole genome regression modelling of large genome-wide association studies"
"It is developed and supported by a team of scientists at the Regeneron Genetics Center."
